sub_title: Mantle of Many Colors | Family Counselor | Author & Inspirational Speaker | Founder
summary:
Maame Durowah is a Ghanaian living in the Netherlands. She is an international inspirational speaker, mentor, youth care social worker, and writer. She is the founder and project manager of the Brighter Day Foundation an international social work & community development organization. She creatively inspires, guides individuals to discover their authentic self to enable them to understand their purpose to impact their family, community and generations.

Maame Durowah develops and provides practical leadership programs to empower and raise leaders, individuals and organizations. The " I AM Mentoring Program" is recognized as an effective and successful project.  A Personal Inspirational Development program to inspire and guide individuals and groups to creatively discover  their authentic self and make an effective impact with their Gift of Life and Voice of Change.  The I AM Mentoring Program has actively taken place in various countries; The Netherlands, Italy, Jamaica, Belgium, Germany and England. 

Maame Durowah Okai works as a Social Worker & Family Counselor in the Netherlands. She gives workshops about Culture Diversity & Cross Culture Communication. She travels around the world as an International 'Inspirational' Speaker; sharing her faith and personal life story. An author of the ' I have never become who I AM' A journey in Finding YOU! Book Journal. She is described as a creative, practical woman of revelatory insight and passion for the orphans, prisoners, youth and young adults. 

Specialized: Youth Delinquencies, Forensic Social Work, Ethnic Profiling, Culture Diversity, Parenting Support African & Caribbean Families, Complex Multiproblem Families, Social Legal Services

school.name: The Myles Munroe Leadership Mentoring Program

projects.title: Dit zijn Wij! "Focus op Identiteitsontwikkeling en Culturele Diversiteit"
projects.description:
'Dit zijn Wij!' is een project dat bestaat uit workshops, basis en verdiepingstrainingen dat uitgebreid stilstaat bij identiteitsontwikkelingen en culturele diversiteit. 

Deze workshop is ontwikkeld als reactie op de uitdagingen op Nederladse scholen nu de diversiteit aan leerlingen in klassen toeneemt. Tevens worden er workshops en trainingen gegeven aan professionals gericht op cultuur sensitief werken. 


Wij liepen er tegenaan dat hier geen passend lesmateriaal voor bestond. We zijn onze managers dan ook dankbaar dat wij de mogelijkheid hebben gekregen om dit zelf te ontwikkelen. 
In de workshop Dit Zijn WIJ staan wij in samenwerking met de kinderen, hun docenten en ouders stil bij de identiteit van de klas en het terugdringen van pestgedrag. Daarnaast geven wij een workshop over cultuur sensitief werken aan professionals.

contributors.headline: Mantle of Many Colors | Family Counselor | Author & Inspirational Speaker | Founder

projects.title: The Kingdom Citizen Tour 2018
projects.description:
Are you ready to make a necessary change in your life or will you keep on existing? As the years go by we discover new things about ourselves in life; whether it has to do with ‘predestined’ discoveries, man-made desires and plans or something else. Yet the necessary question to think about is if those discoveries are part of the real you? The Kingdom citizen tour takes you on a hardcore reality check journey. We believe it to be the season of discovery, change and restoration. Don’t allow yourself to wake up one day with regrets while voicing out: “I have Never Become who I AM”. Instead, make the choice to do what has to be done right now. 

{PURPOSE } The purpose of the tour is to help one creatively discover their purpose and to maximize their potential.

{VISION & MISSION} The Tour entails personal life lessons; stories of how one discovered purpose through the obstacles in life and reveals how it was enabled by going beyond limitations and breaking the status quo. The mission of this tour is to learn, rise and take leadership.

contributors.headline: Mantle of Many Colors | Family Counselor | Author & Inspirational Speaker | Founder

projects.title: I AM Program - Bootcamp Community edition
projects.description:
The city Council in Amsterdam Southeast have been debating about several social issues in the community concerning education,  high school drop outs, single/ teen parents and job opportunities. Social issues that could not remain debate subjects. Appointed district leaders were assigned  to find organizations and young community leaders. Those who can be of influence to organize programs, projects and workshops to highlight the social issues in the community.

One of the young community leaders is Maame Durowah Okai the founder of the Brighter Day foundation. She accepted the proposal to help create awareness in the community and the I AM mentoring program was introduced to the City Council Amsterdam Together with the I AM Team & coaches Ingemar Francisca & Cynthia Ricardo

In order to personally develop in life it’s important to first be aware of whom you are as an individual. Not just the individual that people say you are but rather what you know about yourself. Many times in life when the question is asked: ”Who Are You?” we mostly define ourselves based on an occupation, status or how people see us.

The I AM mentoring program takes it a step further by discovering your personal purpose, potential and mission.  It gives clarity how you stand as that unique individual to make a bigger impact in the community,  generation, family or nation.

With this  program you get the chance to  work on competence that will help you discover “You” and learn how to put “YOU” into practice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RQOOIyF8VH8

profile_positions.company: This is my Story & Youth Team 5
profile_positions.description:
'Dit zijn Wij!' is een project dat bestaat uit workshops, basis en verdiepingstrainingen dat uitgebreid stilstaat bij identiteitsontwikkelingen en culturele diversiteit. 

Deze workshop is ontwikkeld als reactie op de uitdagingen op Nederlandse scholen nu de diversiteit aan leerlingen in klassen toeneemt. Tevens worden er workshops en trainingen gegeven aan professionals en managers gericht op cultuur sensitief werken. 

Story Behind: "Al langere tijd had ik met Shary Jones het verlangen om lessen voor kinderen over identiteit, diversiteit en familiewijsheid te ontwikkelen. Wij liepen er tegenaan dat hier geen passend lesmateriaal voor bestond. We zijn onze managers dan ook dankbaar dat wij de mogelijkheid hebben gekregen om dit zelf te ontwikkelen.  In de workshop Dit Zijn WIJ staan wij in samenwerking met de kinderen, hun docenten en ouders stil bij de identiteit van de klas en het terugdringen van pestgedrag".
profile_positions.title: Dit zijn Wij!

profile_positions.description:
The Brighter Day is a foundation that develops creative, social and community projects. An organization that serves to raise awareness and speak out social issues to empower individuals and communities.

Our mission is to improve and support communities by setting up projects whereby individuals discover and embrace their Gift of Life a "Voice of Change". With the startups & projects, the Brighter Day wants to raise funds to build up schools, pay school fees & create work abilities. 

Visit the website: www.brighterdayfoundation.com 
Discover, Re-Build, Learn, Grow & Teach One.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Help you discover “You” and learn how to put “YOU” into practice.

The I AM program is a mentoring program that helps individuals to work on their personal development. The ability to discover, grow and excel in life.  The program takes you into a place of discovering your personal purpose, potential and life mission. It gives clarity to how you stand as that unique individual to make a bigger impact in the community, generation, family or nation.

Visit the website: www.brighterdayfoundation.com for more information
profile_positions.title: Project Writer & Personal dev. Life Coach

profile_positions.description:
Specialized: Youth Delinquencies, Forensic Social Work, Culture Diversity, Parenting Support African & Caribbean Families, Complex Multiproblem Families, Social Legal Services 

Zaanstad features five youth teams, which together forms a local network for various households of class, families & youth in Zaanstad. A Youth Team supports you and your family. The professionals and expertise in the youth teams are from different organizations. In addition to the support they provide themselves, they can temporarily engage other partners to strengthen the support from the Youth Team. The help provided is based on the needs of the person and a plan is specially made that is suitable to be executed. The youth teams work closely with the professionals: education, family doctors, the Social district teams and the Center Young.  

"District Peldersveld, Hoornseveld & Poelenburg" Besides our expertise, we provide 'out of the box' counseling and programs. We are positioned in the schools,  provide Bootcamps, Personal development training based on identity and anger management,  organize breakfast with the woman in the community, projects for fathers to empower them in the household, diversity trainings etc.  We are part of the community and listen to the voices of the neighborhood.

profile_positions.title: Field work expert

profile_positions.description:
In relation to recent publications by the Government in Amsterdam about “poverty” among the Ghanaian Youth, a number of action groups have been set up by Stadsdeel Southeast to look for the causes of this unpleasant situation, find solutions, and the way forward.

Action group 3, one of the 6 action groups set by Stadsdeel Southeast, has formed a team, comprising of young talented Ghanaians. Who will be trained to become trainers or rolmodels within the Ghanaian Community. They will in-future, organize forums, which will be a platform to educate the Ghanaian youth in all areas of life.

Series of positive interactions has already taken place with some of the youth.

Topics:
* Relationship between the youth and parents
* Expectations from parents and vice versa
* Some differences between the Ghanaian and Dutch Culture in the area of child raising
profile_positions.title: Ghanaian Train Trainers

volunteer_experiences.description: In 2008 a group of young girls went to volunteer at the Peace & Love Orphanage in Ghana.. The project was called “reach out a hand!” and was sponsored by X-plore and PLAN Nederland. They started projects with singing, dancing, poetry, fashion and much more.
